item.description:
Hi Salsa Fans !!!

It's time to visit one of our favorite spots to salsa dance. Here are the Details:

-Cash bar

-Complementary Appetizers

-Dance Lessons (beginner and intermediate)

-Coat check (seasonal)

-Free Garage & Lot parking and free valet on busy nights. (Please don't park at Trader Joe's. Extra ----
parking available across the street from the hotel entrance.)

-Dinner available at Bisuteki Japanese Steakhouse in the Hotel Lobby.

-$12 cover charge

-Lessons: 8pm-10pm ($5 additional)

-Dancing from 10:00-1:30am with Resident DJ's D.Martinez, Hernan, and guests

-Dress: Smart Casual

LESSONS

"NEW! Comprehensive Lessons Program with MetaMovements, our Resident Dance Company."

8pm-9pm: Bachata Lesson (beginner & intermediate)

9pm-10pm: Salsa Lesson (every week)
Beginner and Intermediate Levels

Each lesson is $5 additional. No partner needed. You may switch levels during class if the class you are taking is to hard or too easy.



For More Info visit:
http://salsaboston.co...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a fedora hat. I will also be hanging around the lobby near the entrance until the classes start.

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Dancing at Club Caribe !!!!
